Summary Heading: Very old, overcrowded, no parking, etc.
Summary: Gated community led me to think it's a safe place to live... to my disappointment​ my garage was rubbed when I moved into this looking like posh property... A month later I forgot my iPad​ in the business center and no one returned it. To my surprise, four months later a shame-ridden​ maintenance​ guy told me "good news! I found your ipad!" He gave it to me without the recharging block and wire. He brought it from his apartment that is on the premises​ of #LasPalmas property. When I asked the property manager why his employee took it home instead of taking it to the office​, the response was, "Don't forget your stuff!". Yeah, like ppl forget things on purpose! The long story short, not only the paint chipping off on this old property, but the wood itself is degrading by age or
